channel.title: Fintool - Financial Literacy 101 by Dr. Prof. Erwin Heri
channel.description: This podcast covers basic financial topics and explains them in simple, understandable language. It is aimed at people who have a limited understanding of financial markets and would like to have a refresher or deepen their knowledge. From stocks and shares to bonds and index funds, all the basic asset classes are explained and placed in a broader context. A wide range of financial videos are available on the "https://fintool.ch" video platform. This podcast is provided by Fintool - Your platform for financial literacy by Dr. Prof Erwin Heri, Professor at the University of Basel, Switzerland!
